definitions.definition: The normal convex curvature of the spine in the thoracic and sacral regions.
An abnormal convex curvature of the spine in the cervical or lumbar regions of the spine.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The normal convex curvature of the spine in the thoracic and sacral regions.
secondary_definitions: ( pathology ) An abnormal convex curvature of the spine in the cervical or lumbar regions of the spine.
